article_title: Why shouldn't Missouri become the 26th right-to-work state?
article_text:
Don’t miss our news

Get the latest on government waste, fraud, and abuse - directly in your inbox.

article_metadata.description: Unions who couldn’t convince Missouri lawmakers to vote against right-to-work are bent on stopping a two-thirds majority from overriding Gov. Nixon’s veto.

og.description: Unions who couldn’t convince Missouri lawmakers to vote against right-to-work are bent on stopping a two-thirds majority from overriding Gov. Nixon’s veto.
